title: Luther's critique of Church and its response SAQ

content.question: Directions: In your responses, be sure to address all parts of the questions you answer. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Describe one reason for Martin Luther’s critique of the Catholic Church in the early 1500s.Describe one Catholic response in the 1500s to Luther’s critique.Explain how Luther’s protest contributed to social change in Europe in the period 1517 to 1600.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
